summary: Created 9 E2E tests for spec 08. All 27 tests pass across 3 browsers (chromium, firefox, Mobile Safari). Tests cover page load, title/description, wallet cards, connection forms, disconnected badges, transaction log, sidebar navigation, active link highlighting, and scenario content visibility.
